title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.116 - Function
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.116 - Function

State Regulations
(a) The general end
or purpose sought to be accomplished by an organizational unit. Examples: administrative services; skilled nursing; physical therapy; research; plant
operation and maintenance; dietary. (b) A group of related activities serving a
common end. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.116

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
